I got some great responses for my simple Ruby productivity script so i decided to make it a little better.

it now has lasers. (HTTP server).

Check out the new source from GitHub and lunch your own productivity enhancing server.

Installation

just checkout the source:

git clone git://github.com/eladmeidar/productivity_ftw.git

and fire off the productivity enhancing server:



sudo ruby productivity_ftw.rb

note that you have to use sudo cause you are taking over port 80, not sure if it’s required on windows also.

Adding more hosts to block

open the b-productive.rb file and add to the BLOCK_LIST host array, a better solution is welcome, i am just lazy.

“Thank you”s
